column4: good day, I am new to the unbutu OS and was told this would be place i would be able to get a question answered.
I am trying to get the KDE manu items to show up in the gnome desktop, is there a way?
is there a way to get kde menu items on the gnome desktop?
some kde items will show up in the Gnome menus when you install them, otherwise there's the menu editor
